| `banner`                  | `banner`                    | Text shown in the banner above the document                                                                | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | `docusignFormText.banner`                   |
| `checkboxDescription`     | `checkbox-description`      | Label text for the form submission checkbox                                                                | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | `docusignFormText.checkboxDescription`      |

| `demoData`                | --                          |                                                                                                            | `{ states?: { loading: boolean; submitDisabled: boolean; disabled: boolean; formState: { completedTaxForm: boolean; taxFormExpired: boolean; errors?: any; }; documentType: TaxDocumentType; }; text?: { formStep: string; taxForm: string; taxFormLabel: string; taxFormDescription: string; notBasedInUS: string; banner: string; checkboxLabel: string; checkboxDescription: string; submitButton: string; backButton: string; error: { generalTitle: string; generalDescription: string; formSubmission: string; }; }; }` | `undefined`                                 |
| `formStep`                | `form-step`                 | Sub text shown at the top of the page, used to show the current step of the tax form.                      | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | `docusignFormText.formStep`                 |
| `formSubmissionError`     | `form-submission-error`     | The error message shown at the bottom of the page if the user has not checked the form submission checkbox | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | `docusignFormText.error.formSubmission`     |
| `generalErrorDescription` | `general-error-description` | The error message shown at the top of the page in an error banner                                          | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | `docusignFormText.error.generalDescription` |
| `generalErrorTitle`       | `general-error-title`       | The title for error message shown at the top of the page in an error banner                                | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | `docusignFormText.error.generalTitle`       |
| `notBasedInUS`            | `not-based-in-u-s`          | Text shown in the link to the form for non US residents                                                    | `string`                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                      | `docusignFormText.notBasedInUS`             |
